name: The Butterfly Effect (Zebularck)
description:
The Butterfly Effect is a short, but sweet puzzle platformer based on using past versions of yourself to jump around. What do I mean when I say past versions of yourself? It's like follow the leader, they do what you just did. You walked 3 paces? It walks 3 paces. It's a great way to kill a half hour or so. It runs on Windows XP and up.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys to move

Spacebar to Jump

J to Time Travel

K to Restart Level

Escape to Exit Game
